noisymobs.gui.config.title: Noisy Mobs Configuration
noisymobs.gui.config.vanilla.title: Noisy Mobs Configuration: Vanilla
noisymobs.gui.config.vanilla.keep_min_du: Use the minimum duration of entity
noisymobs.gui.config.vanilla.rayleigh_sc: The σ² parameter of the Rayleigh distribution (higher = longer intervals)
noisymobs.gui.config.discussion.title: Noisy Mobs Configuration: Discussion
noisymobs.gui.config.discussion.use_min_: Use the minimum duration of entities
noisymobs.gui.config.discussion.probabil: The probability to keep the discussion going (1 = keep it forever, 0 = never discuss)
noisymobs.gui.config.discussion.maximum_: The maximum duration of a discussion (random between 100 and this value)
noisymobs.gui.config.duration_modifier_f: The duration modifier factor by number of entities around (0 to disable)
noisymobs.gui.config.sound_limiter.toolt: Enable or disable the sound limiter to limit the amount of sounds played every second
